column4: anybody use amarok with breezy and have it crash all the time?
it updated last night i believe
I mean, when did you install the latest version you have?
it's been updated since yesterday (which was when 1.3.1 was first put in)
so sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install amarok   ...delivers "already latest version"?
it's probably worth compiling a bug report, then.
hm, same; no crashes though. Odd.
alright, well, maybe it was just a fluke thing
but you said it "kept" crashing, no?
its done it like 3x since the upgrade
when it was first packaged there were known problems wiht it. It was repackaged a few times since then though
if you say you have the latest and there's still crashes, then there's apparently still probs.
